6Modules #permalink

Code snippets that come with the brink tech SMACSS package

6.1bubbles #permalink

creates independent content sections that hover above the page in a sort of bubble

Examples
Default styling

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.bubble-1
style 1

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.bubble-round
round bubbles

headline

text lots of text this is text

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
<div class='bubbles [modifier class]' style='width: 100%;'>
	<div class='bubble'> 
		<h3>headline</h3>
		<p>text lots of text this is text</p>
		<ul>
			<li>list item</li>
			<li>list item</li>
			<li>list item</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
</div>

6.2drop shadow #permalink

Creates a drop-shadow effect on any elements with class 'drop-shadow'

Example 
<div class='drop-shadow' style='width: 10em; height: 10em;'></div>

6.3form #permalink

form styles

Examples
Default styling
.form-pretty
a pretty form 
<form class='[modifier class]'>
	<label>name</label><input type='text'></input>
	<label>email</label><input type='email'></input>
	<div class='label-placeholder'></div><input type='submit'></input>
</form>

6.4hover-show #permalink

adds the hover show effect when the mouse hovers over the parent element, all children elements are shown

Examples
Default styling
  • hey
    • there!
.hover-show
adds effect to element and it's children
  • hey
    • there!

<ul>
  <li class="[modifier class]">hey
    <ul>
      <li>there!</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
</ul>

reputation icon
.glyph-trends
trends icon
.glyph-uptime
uptime icon 
<div class='glyph [modifier class]'></div>

  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
.pretty
pretty list
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item
  • list item

<ul class="[modifier class]">
  <li>list item</li>
  <li>list item</li>
  <li>list item</li>
  <li>list item</li>
  <li>list item</li>
  <li class="complete">list item</li>
</ul>

6.7menu #permalink

various types of menu

Example
  • item
  • item
  • item with sub menu
    • sub item
    • sub item
    • sub item
  • item with sub menu
    • sub item
    • sub item
    • sub item
<div class='menu [modifier class]'>
	<ul>
		<li>item</li>
		<li>item</li>
		<li>item with sub menu
			<ul>
				<li>sub item</li>
				<li>sub item</li>
				<li>sub item</li>
			</ul>
		</li>
		<li>item with sub menu
			<ul>
				<li>sub item</li>
				<li>sub item</li>
				<li>sub item</li>
			</ul>
		</li>
	</ul>
</div>

Examples
Default styling
  • herp

  • herp
.nav-horizontal
a horizontal nav
  • herp
  • herp
  • herp
.nav-justified
a horizontal and justified nav
  • herp
  • herp
  • herp
.nav1
different style
  • herp
  • herp
  • herp
<nav class='[modifier class]'>
<ul>
<li><a href='#'>herp</a></li>
<li><a href='#'>herp</a></li>
<li><a href='#'>herp</a></li>
</ul>
</nav>

6.9rounded corners #permalink

adds a border radius to the element

Example

look rounded corners!

<div class='rounded-corners' style='border: 1px solid black; '>
	<p>look rounded corners!</p>
</div>

6.10sidebar #permalink

add a sidebar to your site!

Examples
Default styling
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item

some paragraph content

here's some more content

.sidebar-R
floats the sidebar to the right
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item
  • an item

some paragraph content

here's some more content

<div style='overflow: auto;'>
	<div class='sidebar [modifier class]'>
		<ul>
			<li>an item</li>
			<li>an item</li>
			<li>an item</li>
			<li>an item</li>
			<li>an item</li>
			<li>an item</li>
		</ul>
		<p>some paragraph content</p>
	</div>
	<div>
		<p>here's some more content</p>
	</div>
</div>

your company

used for logos etc.
  • nav item
  • nav item
  • nav item

some content

your company

<div><div class="top-background-image"></div><nav><ul><li>nav item</li><li>nav item</li><li>nav item</li></ul></nav><main><p>some content</p></main><footer><p>your company</p></footer></div>
